article.Heading: Interim Budget to be presented in TN assembly on February 16
article.Summary: Speaker P Dhanapal has convened the House on February 16 where the interim budget will be presented, Tamil Nadu Legislative Assembly Secretary AMP Jamaludeen said in a release here. Interim budget is being presented since the state goes to polls in about three months.
article.Body:
Tamil Nadu government will present its interim Budget for the year 2016-17 on February 16 as Assembly elections are due in the state.

Speaker P Dhanapal has convened the House on February 16 where the interim budget will be presented, Tamil Nadu Legislative Assembly Secretary AMP Jamaludeen said in a release here. Interim budget is being presented since the state goes to polls in about three months.

The House had earlier met for the customary Governor's address and a debate on it last month.
